archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Je-S online RC UK
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Je-S is used by AHRC, BBSRC, EPSRC, ESRC, MRC, NERC and STFC (formerly CCLRC and PPARC), as well as the Technology Strategy Board (TSB), Energy Technologies Institute (ETI) and National Centre for the Replacement, Refinement and Reduction of Animals in Research (NC3Rs), to provide their communities with electronic grant services. https://je-s.rcuk.ac.uk/JeS2WebLoginSite/Login.aspx
